content: find the youtube tutorial here https //m youtube com/watch v=_oa5jdeucdg&pp=0gcjcu8jaycqiyzv this pattern is crocheted in overlay mosaic crochet combined with tapestry crochet the finished size of the big splash is between 37-41 cm when crocheted on hook size 4 mm you will need to use at least 3 colors options for color changes are indicated in the pattern with bold and blue writing this pattern is suitable for advanced crocheteers a full tutorial will be available soon to make the pattern accessible for less experienced crocheters too attach your big splash in a hoop to turn it into a wall hanging or make a beautiful pillow out of your big splash a pattern for the back of the pillow will be released separately
